articles.author: Andrew Miller
articles.title: Biden spotted in Nantucket shopping indoors without a mask despite sign mandating them - Fox News
articles.description: President Joe Biden was spotted shopping inside a store over the weekend without wearing a mask which he has repeatedly urged Americans to wear.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden was spotted shopping inside a store over the weekend without wearing a mask which he has repeatedly urged Americans to wear.

articles.author: Mike Snider and Romina Ruiz-Goiriena, USA TODAY
articles.title: A frightful flight: Man stows away in plane's landing gear on flight from Guatemala to Miami - USA TODAY
articles.description: Man stows away in plane landing gear on American Airlines flight Saturday from Guatemala to Miami. Apparently uninjured he is taken to local hospital.
articles.content:
An American Airlines flight from Guatemala to Miami Saturday was revealed to have one additional passenger on board: A man who had stowed away in the plane's landing gear.

articles.author: Gina Kolata
articles.title: A Cure for Type 1 Diabetes? For One Man, It Seems to Have Worked. - The New York Times
articles.description: A new treatment using stem cells that produce insulin has surprised experts and given them hope for the 1.5 million Americans living with the disease.
articles.content:
After years when nothing worked, a small team of researchers, including Felicia Pagliuca, a postdoctoral researcher, was in the lab one night in 2014, doing one more experiment.

articles.title: Omicron variant in 'fluid motion', scientists coordinating with South Africa: Dr Anthony Fauci - India Today
articles.description: Dr Anthony Fauci, America's leading infectious disease expert, stated that the new Covid-19 Omicron variant is in 'fluid motion' and that US scientists are coordinating with South African scientists.
